attributes.action: Scrap Plans for Council Tax Snoopers to have the right to Photograph Inside of Voters homes and base valuations on Interior conditions of Peoples homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This plan to allow snoopers to enter our homes and photograph our belongings and furniture is an affront to our Civil and Human rights. It should be scrapped and the tax should not be based on peoples hard work and efforts to make their homes decent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
